entry.title: Solutions for this new centralization INSIDE Bitcoin?
entry.summary: The email expresses a strong disagreement with a proposal concerning the bitcoin market. The sender criticizes the idea of controlling who can buy or sell bitcoin based on personal criteria, suggesting that such an approach is overly restrictive and unfair. They argue against the proposed solution to confiscate coins and redistribute them to align with the author's preferences. Instead, the sender recommends creating a new cryptocurrency that adheres to these ideals, allowing those who agree with such principles to participate freely. This suggestion implies a belief in the importance of freedom and diversity within the cryptocurrency community, advocating for the creation of alternatives rather than imposing restrictions on existing systems.
